org.apache.hadoop.net

Class SocketIOWithTimeout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.net.SocketIOWithTimeout
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SocketInputStream.Reader, SocketOutputStream.Writer

    abstract class SocketIOWithTimeout
extends Object
    This supports input and output streams for a socket channels. These streams can have a timeout.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  SocketIOWithTimeout.SelectorPool
      This maintains a pool of selectors.

      • getChannel

      • checkChannelValidity

        static void checkChannelValidity(Object channel)
                          throws IOException
        Utility function to check if channel is ok. Mainly to throw IOException instead of runtime exception in case of mismatch. This mismatch can occur for many runtime reasons.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • performIO

        abstract int performIO(ByteBuffer buf)
                throws IOException
        Performs actual IO operations. This is not expected to block.
        Parameters:
        buf -
        Returns:
        number of bytes (or some equivalent). 0 implies underlying channel is drained completely. We will wait if more IO is required.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • doIO

        int doIO(ByteBuffer buf,
       int ops)
   throws IOException
        Performs one IO and returns number of bytes read or written. It waits up to the specified timeout. If the channel is not read before the timeout, SocketTimeoutException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        buf - buffer for IO
        ops - Selection Ops used for waiting. Suggested values: SelectionKey.OP_READ while reading and SelectionKey.OP_WRITE while writing.
        Returns:
        number of bytes read or written. negative implies end of stream.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • connect

        static void connect(SocketChannel channel,
           SocketAddress endpoint,
           int timeout)
             throws IOException
        The contract is similar to SocketChannel.connect(SocketAddress) with a timeout.
        Parameters:
        channel - - this should be a SelectableChannel
        endpoint -
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        SocketChannel.connect(SocketAddress)

      • waitForIO

        void waitForIO(int ops)
         throws IOException
        This is similar to doIO(ByteBuffer, int) except that it does not perform any I/O. It just waits for the channel to be ready for I/O as specified in ops.
        Parameters:
        ops - Selection Ops used for waiting
        Throws:
        SocketTimeoutException - if select on the channel times out.
        IOException - if any other I/O error occurs.

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(long timeoutMs)

      • timeoutExceptionString

        private static String timeoutExceptionString(SelectableChannel channel,
                            long timeout,
                            int ops)
